name: BaseFaker_doWithTest
description: Unit tests for the doWith method in BaseFaker class, focusing on locale handling and exception scenarios.

test_cases.name: testDoWithLocaleSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful execution of the doWith method with a specific locale, ensuring the result is not null.

test_cases.name: testDoWithLocaleException
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of exceptions within the doWith method, ensuring the correct exception type is thrown and caught.

test_cases.name: testDoWithLocaleFinallyBlock
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the doWith method in a finally block, ensuring the locale is reset to its initial state after execution.
